title: Week 1 Picks Against the Spread, Best Bets, Gambling Advice (Football 9/11)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Pete Prisco, R.J. White and Kenny White for the return of the Friday 'Best Bets' episode. The guys go through all 15 games on the slate for Sunday and Monday, giving their thoughts on each one and offering their best bets on the games they like the most. They discuss; Packers-Vikings (5:45), Seahawks-Falcons (11:45), Cowboys-Rams (15:30), Cardinals-49ers (21:30), Panthers-Raiders (28:00), Bucs-Saints (37:00), Dolphins-Pats (40:00), Browns-Ravens (42:30), Eagles-Washington (44:00), Jets-Bills (46:30), Bears-Lions (49:15) Colts-Jaguars (51:15), Chargers-Bengals (54:15), Steelers-Giants (56:45) and Titans-Broncos (58:00).
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @PriscoCBS, @rjwhite1, @KWhiteyVegas
Visit the Pick Six YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/picksix
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/
For more NFL coverage from CBS Sports, visit https://www.cbssports.com/nfl/
To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visit https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/
